backend/main.mo: Actor implementing lead submission and RBAC-protected admin/user profile operations using AccessControl and in-memory maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking an auto-rotating hero slider feature to its source file, components, and test ID.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of all main frontend files and sections.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind setup defining OKLCH color tokens, dark mode variables, and base styling for background, borders, and text.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading Inter fonts, defining SEO metadata, and mounting the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Client-side router that switches between homepage sections or standalone pages and manages scroll behavior on navigation.
frontend/src/components/contact/CompanyP: A dialog component for collecting basic user info, validating it, submitting a lead, and triggering a company profile download.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactO: Displays a grid of contact options including scheduling a call, downloading a company profile, emailing, and WhatsApp contact.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component showing copyright, a Caffeine.ai attribution link, and a dynamic year.
frontend/src/components/forms/ControlLea: A lead-generation form that validates company and contact details, submits them, and shows a success message.
frontend/src/components/forms/FounderCon: A detailed inquiry form for the Founder Control Blueprint, validating inputs and submitting lead data.
frontend/src/components/forms/Industries: A lead-gen form for industry-specific requests, validating user inputs and submitting the collected information.
frontend/src/components/forms/InsightsNe: Newsletter signup form with validation, lead submission, and success/reset states.
frontend/src/components/forms/ProcessLea: Lead generation form collecting company, industry, revenue, and challenge details, submitting via useLeadSubmission.
frontend/src/components/forms/StrategySe: Application form for strategy sessions capturing business details, bottlenecks, and systems before submitting a lead.
frontend/src/components/industries/CaseS: Card component that displays a case study title and opens its PDF or shows a placeholder.
frontend/src/components/industries/indus: Static content definitions for industries, including services, challenges, solutions, and case studies.
frontend/src/components/industries/Indus: Renders an industry section with challenges, solutions, major service tiles, and related case studies.
frontend/src/components/industries/Major: Displays a service tile with an image or placeholder and the service label.
frontend/src/components/ScrollToTopContr: Floating button that appears after scrolling and smooth-scrolls the user back to the top.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Renders a contact section with email, phone, address, and a button to book a strategy call.
frontend/src/components/sections/Control: Displays the CONTROL framework steps with images in a scrollable grid and a link to read more.
frontend/src/components/sections/Emotion: Shows a dark-themed section describing founder dependency and the need for strategic systems.
frontend/src/components/sections/FinalCt: Provides a final call-to-action encouraging users to book a strategy call.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Defines the hero area with a background image and embeds the HeroSlider component.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSli: Implements an interactive sliding hero banner with CTAs, navigation, and touch-drag support.
frontend/src/components/sections/Industr: Lists target industries with icon cards describing how the service benefits each sector.
frontend/src/components/sections/Insight: Shows insight cards summarizing articles with categories and excerpts.
frontend/src/components/sections/Outcome: Highlights key business outcomes and displays a dashboard mockup image.
frontend/src/components/sections/PageHer: Provides a reusable hero section with configurable title, subtitle, description, and background.
frontend/src/components/sections/Problem: Displays a grid of common business problems with icons and a closing message about system issues.
frontend/src/components/sections/Process: Defines a multi-step process with accordion-based structured content and CTAs for each service stage.
frontend/src/components/sections/WhatIno: Shows three core features—Control, Clarity, Continuity—with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Sticky navigation bar with scroll-based active section tracking, mobile sheet menu, and custom client-side routing logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminLeads.ts: Fetches all leads for admin users via the actor with caching and loading states.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminStatus.ts: Checks whether the current caller is an admin using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, state management, and context for authentication across the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeadSubmission.ts: Handles lead submission to the backend with loading, success, and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects the user's reduced-motion preference via a media query.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a custom design system with utilities, colors, and motion preferences.
frontend/src/lib/contactConfig.ts: Holds external contact configuration and static company contact details.
frontend/src/lib/strategyCall.ts: Navigates the user to the strategy-session page with smooth scrolling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard page handling Internet Identity login and conditional fetching of admin status and leads, with various UI states for loading and errors.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact page with hero section, contact options, an inquiry form, qualification criteria, and hash‑based scrolling behavior.
Marketing page explaining the CONTROL™ framework, its stages, and includes a scroll-to-form CTA and lead generation form.
frontend/src/pages/IndustriesPage.tsx: Industries overview page showing served sectors, industry blocks, and common operational challenges with a strategy call CTA.
frontend/src/pages/InsightsPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/ProcessPage.tsx: Process overview page outlining philosophy and a structured 4‑stage transformation process with supporting sections and CTAs.
frontend/src/pages/StrategySessionPage.t: React page rendering a strategy session hero, eligibility sections, and a scroll-to-form handler.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities to read, store, persist, and clear URL or session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking state, features, and pending requests for auto-advancing a hero banner.
